name: Shygirl
description: '''Blane Muise''' (born 4 May 1993), better known by her stage name '''Shygirl''', is a British singer, [[Disc jockey|DJ]], rapper, songwriter and co-head/founder of record label and collective Nuxxe. Shygirl's music incorporates elements of [[dance music]], [[hip hop|hip-hop]], [[experimental pop]], [[Grime (music genre)|grime]] and [[deconstructed club]]. She has also been associated with the [[hyperpop]] music scene. Shygirl rose to prominence after working with close collaborator and friend [[Sega Bodega]], as well as other well-known [[Experimental music|experimental]] producers [[Arca (musician)|Arca]] and [[Sophie (musician)|Sophie]], and gaining attention from the likes of [[Rihanna]], who has used various Nuxxe tracks for her [[Fenty Beauty]] commercials and fashion shows. Shygirl has released various singles since 2016, and three EPs titled ''Cruel Practice'', ''[[Alias (EP)|Alias]]'' and ''[[Club Shy]]''. Her debut studio album ''[[Nymph (album)|Nymph]]'' was released on 30 September 2022 to widespread acclaim from music critics.
